theBerserker:RecklessCleave.NAME: Reckless Cleave
theBerserker:RecklessCleave.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Deal !D! damage to a target then deal !D! damage to all enemies

theBerserker:GreaterCleave.NAME: Greater Cleave
theBerserker:GreaterCleave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies twice.

theBerserker:Rampage.NAME: RAMPAGE
theBerserker:Rampage.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. Draw a card. Deal !D! damage.

theBerserker:AxeAQuestion.NAME: Axe A Question
theBerserker:AxeAQuestion.DESCRIPTION: Applies !M! Weak and Vulnerable to target.

theBerserker:Axetion.NAME: Axetion
theBerserker:Axetion.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Regen. Gain 2 Energy. Lose !M! health.

theBerserker:JaxPremium.NAME: J.A.X Premium
theBerserker:JaxPremium.DESCRIPTION: Lose 10 Max HP. Draw 2 cards. Gain !M! Strength. Gain 1 Energy.

theBerserker:QuickFix.NAME: Quick Fix
theBerserker:QuickFix.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. Shuffle 2 Wounds into your drawpile.

theBerserker:Sacrifice.NAME: Sacrifice
theBerserker:Sacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. Draw 1 card. Gain 1 Energy.

theBerserker:DoubleEdge.NAME: Double Edge
theBerserker:DoubleEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Shuffle 2 Wounds into your Discard. Lose !M! HP.

theBerserker:Panic.NAME: Panic
theBerserker:Panic.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 5 Wound into your discard. Gain !M! Regen. Heal !M!

theBerserker:Revenge.NAME: Revenge
theBerserker:Revenge.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to damage taken this combat.

theBerserker:WhirlwindOfDeath.NAME: Whirlwind Of Death
theBerserker:WhirlwindOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card deal !M! damage to all enemies equal to the amount of cards played this turn. (Max 3)
theBerserker:WhirlwindOfDeath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card deal !M! damage to all enemies equal to the amount of cards played this turn. (Max 3)

theBerserker:Ritual.NAME: Ritual
theBerserker:Ritual.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Gain 5 Max HP. Exhaust.
theBerserker:Ritual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Gain 5 Max HP. Draw 1 card. Exhaust.

theBerserker:AllIn.NAME: ALL IN
theBerserker:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 50 Wounds into your Discard. Gain !M! Strength.
